TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MessageDescriptionCollection extends System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1<class System.ServiceModel.Description.MessageDescription>
Public Class MessageDescriptionCollection Inherits Collection(Of MessageDescription)

Docs.summary: Provides a collection that is used to store descriptions of the messages that make up an operation that belongs to a contract.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> is used to describe contracts and their associated operations. Each contract operation has a corresponding <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription> that describes aspects of the operation, such as whether the operation is one-way or request/reply. Each <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription> in turn describes the messages that make up the operation using a collection of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MessageDescription>.
## Examples

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.ServiceModel.Description.MessageDescription Find(string action) cil managed
Public Function Find (action As String) As MessageDescription

Docs.param: The action of the message being found.
Docs.summary: Finds and returns the first message description in a collection for a message with a specified action.
Docs.returns: The first from the collection whose message has the specified and if no matching is found.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If you need to find all of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MessageDescription> objects in the collection that match the specified `action`, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MessageDescriptionCollection.FindAll%28System.String%29> method instead.
## Examples

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1<class System.ServiceModel.Description.MessageDescription> FindAll(string action) cil managed
Public Function FindAll (action As String) As Collection(Of MessageDescription)

Docs.param: The action of the messages being found.
Docs.summary: Finds and returns all of the message descriptions in a collection whose messages have a specified action.
Docs.returns: A that contains the collection message descriptions from the current collection whose messages have the specified . If no matching objects are found, an empty collection is returned.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If you need to find the first instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MessageDescription> in the collection that match the specified `action`, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MessageDescriptionCollection.Find%28System.String%29> method instead.
## Examples
